== Lenses ==
=== Already Supported ===
==== Configuration files ====
* /etc/aliases
* /etc/apt/sources.list
* /etc/fstab
* /boot/grub/menu.lst
* /etc/hosts
* /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-* (RedHat)
* /etc/inittab
* /etc/pam.d/*
* /etc/ssh/sshd_config
* /etc/sysconfig/ (RedHat)
* /etc/vsftpd.conf
* /etc/xinetd.d/*
* /etc/xinetd.conf
* /etc/yum.conf (RedHat)
* /etc/yum.repos.d/* (RedHat)

==== "Library" lenses (for lenses development use) ====
* shell variables
* utililties
* xml
